client.controller
Class SensorInfo

java.lang.Object
  client.controller.SensorInfo

public class SensorInfo
extends java.lang.Object

File: SensorInfo.java Authors: Sean Jagat and Nick Knowlson Assignment: 4 Class: CPS235 Instructor: Frank Niscak Due Date: November 23, 2007 Purpose: The SensorInfo class stores all of the information about the sensors for use by the GUI.

public void setXPos(double pos)
